channel.title: Huge Contreversey *TreyArch* or *InfinityWard* It's all up to you =)
channel.description:
So pretty much I'm here to ask you this... InfinityWard or TreyArch.
Here's the good things bout both.
Infinity has best graphics... (of couse as seen in Mw2) Yet TreyArch now has thier new hit, Nazi Zombies. Also TreyArch is making, Call of Duty: Vietnam a.k.a (cod7) Which people are going crazy wondering if they will have zombies, which i belive would technically be JAP zombs. So u pick.:):)

item.title: Huge Contreversey *TreyArch* or *InfinityWard* It's all up to you =)
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Infinityward for gameplay and graphics. Treyarch for listening to the community and making active changes.

DICE beats them all though.

Read full topic
